message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product. I think you'll find it very valuable. I'm asking for $115.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Can you meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $105 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $110. This is a very competitive price for a product of this quality.
I understand that $110 is a competitive price, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you meet me at $108? I'm willing to compromise.
